name: Crazy Rider (itch) (khizar93)
description:
Controls: Tap with left-mouse button and drag around to move the car.
(Note: just get enables on bottom-half of the screen).

Rules:

- Collect food items placed on floor. Collide with stalls and roaming NPC with stacked items to get extra food.

- Avoid collision with the ones who chase after the car.

A hyper-casual game developed by team food-hungers for Epiphany GameJam 2.0.

We wanted to do something different for the game as there were already a number of games that included "Food" as their theme. Most of the games had food delivery so we thought of combining the functionality and instead of using a person we changed it to a car. We also added some NPC's so that the user can enjoy hitting them and taking their crates but also avoid some as to not lose the food stacked in the trunk. Adding more obstacles also gave the game a bit of difficulty. Initially, we thought of creating a setting for a monkey to steal bananas and deliver them to the zoo, but with more discussion the game then refined to the state it is now.

Developers:

Khizar, Zain, Mehwish, Sufian.

Artist:

Jesiel, Ammara
